title: Coordinate Home Staging
description: To maximize a home's appeal, an agent and seller decide to have it professionally staged. The agent must coordinate the process.

tasks.description: Provide the seller with a list of recommended home staging companies.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a list of approved staging vendors.

tasks.description: Schedule a consultation between the chosen stager and the seller.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books the initial consultation.

tasks.description: Coordinate the staging installation day, ensuring it happens before the photographer is scheduled.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent schedules the staging and photography in the correct sequence.
